title: St Carlo Acutis Novena
description: Pray to the millennial saint today. Blessed Carlo Acutis intercedes for tech workers, gamers, and youth. Experience his joyful devotion to the Eucharist.

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Most Holy Trinity, Father, Son and Holy Spirit, I thank you for all the grace and favors with which you enriched the soul of St Carlo Acutis during his fifteen years on this earth. Through the merits of this Angel of Youth, grant me the grace which I earnestly seek (mention request here‚Ä¶). Amen. St Carlo, you made the Holy Eucharist the focus of your life and devoted yourself to God in our modern times. You engaged in the world but did not attach yourself to it. Through your prayers obtain for me the graces from God to do the same, to be faithful always and lead others to Christ and His Holy Catholic Church. Amen.

Almighty God, Father of Mercy, we praise and bless you for raising Carlo Acutis to the glory of the altars so that through him you will be even more glorified. May we, like him, follow Your will in our lives, and through his merit, give me the grace that I so ardently desire. Amen. Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be St. Carlo Acutis, pray for us!

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.
